data.why:
I want to contribute Modules for Japanese language processing.

    The first Module will be something in the line of
    "Lingua::JA::Translit", which hopefully will solve all
    transliteration/transcription needs from Japanese to latin Alphabet
    honoring national and international standards, the most common
    transliteration schemes, and special transliteration systems as used
    for roadsigns, railwaystation names, etc. With "Lingua::JA::Romaji"
    there is allready a toy-module which tries to solve this problems
    partly, but in my opinion a much more flexible and trustable
    framework is needed.

meta.subject: PAUSE ID request (AMR; Andreas Marcel Riechert)
